thread.title: Exclusive: U.S. considers tightening grip on China ties to hi-tech

title: Exclusive: U.S. considers tightening grip on China ties to hi-tech
text:
Exclusive: U.S. considers tightening grip on China ties to hi-tech 6:13am EDT - 01:56
The U.S. government may start scrutinizing informal partnerships between American and Chinese companies in the field of artificial intelligence, threatening practices that have long been considered garden variety development work for tech companies, sources familiar with the discussions said.
The U.S. government may start scrutinizing informal partnerships between American and Chinese companies in the field of artificial intelligence, threatening practices that have long been considered garden variety development work for tech companies, sources familiar with the discussions said. //reut.rs/2r6yaWn
